languages.text: "Алые тени, посланники смерти, тебя провожали. Моими глазами, моими ушами были они. И каждый твой выбор я видел, и каждое слово услышал".
"Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."
languages.original_text: "Алые тени, посланники смерти, тебя провожали. Моими глазами, моими ушами были они. И каждый твой выбор я видел, и каждое слово услышал".

traits.locale_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."
"Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."
"Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

"Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

languages.text: "Purpurrote Schatten, die Boten des Todes, haben Euch begleitet. Sie waren meine Augen und Ohren. Und so habe ich jede Eurer Entscheidungen gesehen, jedes Eurer Worte gehört."
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

traits.locale_text: "Purpurrote Schatten, die Boten des Todes, haben Euch begleitet. Sie waren meine Augen und Ohren. Und so habe ich jede Eurer Entscheidungen gesehen, jedes Eurer Worte gehört."

languages.text: «L{mf|e|a} acompañaron sombras escarlatas, mensajeras de la muerte. Fueron mis ojos y mis oídos. Así contemplé cada decisión que tomó y escuché cada palabra que pronunció».
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|e|a} acompañaron sombras escarlatas, mensajeras de la muerte. Fueron mis ojos y mis oídos. Así contemplé cada decisión que tomó y escuché cada palabra que pronunció».

languages.text: 「死の死者である緋色の影が同行していた。彼らは我が目であり、耳であった。こうして私はあなたの選択をすべて見て、言葉をすべて聞いた」
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

traits.locale_text: 「死の死者である緋色の影が同行していた。彼らは我が目であり、耳であった。こうして私はあなたの選択をすべて見て、言葉をすべて聞いた」

languages.text: “您的身边有猩红色的影子同行，他们都是死亡的使者，也是我的耳目。通过这种方式，我看到了您做出的每个选择，听到了您说出的每句话语。”
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

traits.locale_text: “您的身边有猩红色的影子同行，他们都是死亡的使者，也是我的耳目。通过这种方式，我看到了您做出的每个选择，听到了您说出的每句话语。”

languages.text: « Des ombres écarlates, les messagères de la mort, vous ont {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} tout du long. Elles sont mes yeux et mes oreilles. Et c'est ainsi que j'ai assisté à chacun de vos choix et entendu chacune de vos paroles. »
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."

traits.locale_text: « Des ombres écarlates, les messagères de la mort, vous ont {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} tout du long. Elles sont mes yeux et mes oreilles. Et c'est ainsi que j'ai assisté à chacun de vos choix et entendu chacune de vos paroles. »

languages.text: "Kan kızılı gölgeler ve ölümün müjdecileri size eşlik etti. Onlar benim gözüm kulağımdır. Bundandır ki yaptığınız her bir seçimi görüp söylediğiniz her bir sözü işittim."
languages.original_text: "Scarlet shadows, death's messengers, accompanied you. They were my eyes and my ears. And thus I saw every choice you made, and heard every word you spoke."
